one_reviews_text: I tried to move with my joysticks but I have to thrust my body and it sucks

review_title: Looked bad and I was stuck in the floor.
one_reviews_text: I don't know if there was a novel idea that birthed this (maybe the dashing locomotion_ but otherwise its a hot mess of a tutorial level.
Ummm, well the movement is terrible, the menu is way to overdone, graphics and gameplay have terrible quality, and the weapons are completely garbage. Pls don’t waste space on this game.
this game is mega super biggest geiy ever
I am confusion why is te moovmehnt sooo glishy

See, I can totally feel the potentiol but.... needs a little more work. developer I love the idea. movement is a great way to be original. problem is the tutorial always fails to calibrate my height, I always remain a midget, and the graphics could use some work. but hey, they are descent. secondly the players need to keep an eye on this game. When the devs (Or dev) optimises the game A little we will want to know so that when that happens the servers arent blatantly empty. wouldnt reccomend playing YET but keep an eye on it. Cheers devs!

The game has potential, but the controls are difficult. Even if they weren't difficult, it is a very tedious way to move around. I would enjoy the game much more if it just has the option to move around with the stick. The menus are also a little confusing.
Needs better controls (integrate more with touch controls i.e. being able to use your hand normally)
he movement system is the worst I've ever seen, Jesus Christ come on!
Definitely needs work.. doubt they ever will fix
